title: Feature ID in EXT_instance_features
description: Feature IDs stored in a GPU mesh instancing attribute

featureCount.description: The number of unique features in the attribute.

nullFeatureId.description: A value that indicates that no feature is associated with this instance.

label.description: A label assigned to this feature ID set. Labels must be alphanumeric identifiers matching the regular expression `^[a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*$`.

attribute.description: An attribute containing feature IDs. When this is omitted, then the feature IDs are assigned to the GPU instances by their index.

propertyTable.description: The index of the property table containing per-feature property values. Only applicable when using the `EXT_structural_metadata` extension.
